incidents.title: Database Connection Failure
incidents.description: Database connection failed with timeout error
incidents.root_cause: Network connectivity issue between application and database
incidents.impact: User authentication and data retrieval affected
incidents.resolution: Network configuration updated and connection restored

incidents.title: High CPU Usage Alert
incidents.root_cause: Memory leak in background job processing
incidents.resolution: Memory leak fixed in job processor

incidents.title: API Endpoint Failure
incidents.root_cause: Null pointer exception in user service
incidents.resolution: Null check added in user service
